## Path3D.getNormals() method

Returns an array populated with normal vectors on each Path3D curve point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getNormals(): Vector3[];
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3[]`

an array populated with normal vectors on each Path3D curve point.
